function rot13(str) { // LBH QVQ VG! let rot1 = ['A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','J','I','K','L','M']; let rot2 = ['N','O','P','Q','R','S','T','U','W','V','X','Y','Z']; let cipher = str.split(''); let result = []; for (let i = 0; i < cipher.length; i++) { for (let y = 0; y < rot1.length; y++) { if(cipher[i] === rot1[y]) { result.push(rot2[y]); } if(cipher[i] === rot2[y]) { result.push(rot1[y]); } } if(cipher[i].match(/\W/)) { result.push(cipher[i]); } } return result.join(''); }function convertToRoman(num) { let Symbol = ['M','CM','D','CD','C','XC','L','XL','X','IX','V','IV','I']; let nums = [1000, 900, 500, 400, 100, 90, 50, 40, 10, 9, 5, 4, 1]; let somthin = ''; for(let i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { while(nums[i] <= num) { somthin += Symbol[i]; num -= nums[i]; } } return somthin; } function convertToRoman(num) { let Symbol = {M:1000, CM:900, D:500, CD:400, C:100, XC:90, L:50, XL:40, X:10, IX:9, V:5, IV:4, I:1}; } return sum.filter(i => { return i % 2 !== 0; }).reduce((a,b) => a + b); } function fearNotLetter(str) { let nofear = ''; let alphabet = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"; let index1 = alphabet.indexOf(str[0]); } } if(nofear) { return nofear; } return undefined; } fearNotLetter("stvwx"); function myReplace(str, before, after) { let afterUp = after.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+after.slice(1); if(before.charCodeAt(0) >= 65 && before.charCodeAt(0) <= 90) { return str.replace(before,afterUp);
